placedetails: Experience the diverse culinary scene of New York City as you dine in charming bistros, taste gourmet creations, and immerse yourself in the vibrant food culture...
itinerary: 6:00 PM: Start at iconic bistro, Welcome aperitif
7:30 PM: Move to second venue, Appetizer and wine pairing
8:45 PM: Third venue, Main course and wine pairing
10:00 PM: Final stop, Dessert and farewell
additionalInfo: Weather: Check local forecast before your visit.

faq.question: Is this tour suitable for vegetarians?
faq.answer: Yes, vegetarian options are available at each venue.

faq.question: Is alcohol included in the tour?
faq.answer: Yes, wine pairings are included with dinner.

faq.question: Can I bring children on the tour?
faq.answer: The tour is recommended for ages 12 and up.

faq.question: Is transportation provided between venues?
faq.answer: Yes, local transportation is arranged between restaurants.

faq.question: Can I customize the itinerary?
faq.answer: The tour follows a set itinerary to showcase the best culinary experiences.

faq.question: How do I make a reservation?
faq.answer: You can reserve online through our website or by contacting our customer service.

refundprocess: Full refund available up to 7 days before the tour.
No refunds for cancellations within 48 hours of the tour.
Contact our support team for refund inquiries.

placedetails: Embark on a gastronomic adventure through the enchanting streets of Paris, where Michelin-starred restaurants and charming bistros await...
itinerary: 7:30 PM: Begin at Michelin-starred restaurant, Welcome champagne
8:45 PM: Second venue, Appetizer and wine pairing
9:30 PM: Main course at charming bistro, Wine pairing
additionalInfo: Weather: Varies by season, plan accordingly.
Advance notice of dietary restrictions required.

faq.question: Are vegetarian meal options available?
faq.answer: Yes, vegetarian options are available at each restaurant.

faq.question: Is transportation included?
faq.answer: Yes, transportation to and from the restaurants is provided.

faq.question: Can children participate in the tour?
faq.answer: The tour is designed for adult participants.

faq.question: Can I customize the itinerary?
faq.answer: The tour follows a set itinerary to showcase the finest dining experiences.

faq.question: Is there a dress code for the tour?
faq.answer: Elegant attire is recommended for the upscale dining venues.

faq.question: How do I make a reservation?
faq.answer: You can reserve online through our website or by contacting our customer service.

refundprocess: Full refund available up to 7 days before the tour.
No refunds for cancellations within 48 hours of the tour.
Contact our support team for refund inquiries.
